itunes:title: Faith in Practice Week 4 with Kelly Minter
title: Faith in Practice Week 4 with Kelly Minter
description:
For the final episode of our Faith in Practice series, join us for a conversation among friends with author, speaker, and songwriter Kelly Minter. This week, Raechel, Amanda, and Kelly engage in an honest and vulnerable conversation about their difficult, yet freeing personal experiences with the disciplines of solitude, silence, simplicity, chastity, and remembrance. Connecting the practice of these disciplines to everything from the rhythms of Peloton workouts to Portuguese lessons, they help us tackle the often unasked yet wrestled with question, Can freedom and discipline co-exist? 

 Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth Faith in Practice reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Faith in Practice Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/faith-in-practice-week-4-with-kelly-minter/
